ISSUE.TITLE: Form-FlowPart template should be more generic
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: FormPart Description says: > Turns your content item into a form. If you add the form content part to your custom content type it won't render a form because the https://github.com/OrchardCMS/OrchardCore/blob/dev/src/OrchardCore.Modules/OrchardCore.Forms/Views/Form-FlowPart.cshtml template is connected to the _Form_ content type.
